pr_title: Introduce automatic module names into all libraries being built.

timeline.message: Introduce automatic module names into all libraries being built.

timeline.bodyText: Missing empty newline at the end of these.
timeline.author: conniey

replies.bodyText: I've added an empty new line to the root build.gradle, as it did not have one (prior to my involvement). All other files no longer have been touched at the end of the file, so they remain as they were.
replies.author: JonathanGiles

timeline.message: Centralise manifest config of automatic module name into root build.gradle file.

timeline.bodyText: we don't have "api" in the package names, does that matter?
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: No, it doesn't matter. Module names do not need to relate to the package name, although they are a good starting point for choosing a good module name.
replies.author: JonathanGiles
